Detailed Description

An MC2 coordinate containing a latitude and longitude.

Member Data Documentation

const MC2Coordinate MC2Coordinate::invalidCoordinate [static]
 

The invalid coordinate.

NB! not all invalid coordinates are exactly equal to this, operator== might return false even if the other coordinate is invalid too.
